description.value: Red-billed yagudo, beyond just their red beaks, have particularly rigid and sharp feathers. They also have some of the loosest and fastest-growing feathers of any yagudo, molting more often as a result. Using this to their advantage, cornered red-bills pluck their own feathers for use as weaponized darts, or kick up storms of molted feathers to slice into attackers. Feather plucking is a fairly painful proposition, but worth it in a pinch.

system.classDetails:
Red-Billed Yagudo Traits

  • Attribute Increase: Your Constitution increases by 1.
  • Weapon Proficiency: You have proficiency in Darts and Throwing Stars.
  • Feather Dart: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.AZFMQ7BHH1FI8KQ1]{Feather Dart}
  • Cutting Vortex: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.RPGQ60LMXPS8ECQA]{Cutting Vortex}
